description: This trap is to communicate that on the interface
where security authorization (MAC or IP to port) is
enabled, frame arrived that is not authorized for that
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PDN-ARP-MIB::unauthorizedUserEvent IP-MIB::ipNetToMediaIfIndex i 9999 IP-MIB::ipNetToMediaPhysAddress s EXAMPLE

description: The interface on which this entry's equivalence
is effective. The interface identified by a
particular value of this index is the same
interface as identified by the same value of
variables.name: IP-MIB::ipNetToMediaIfIndex
